title: Azuki-chan the Movie
synopsis: It's Valentines' Day, the girls are thinking about the chocolate to give to their love.  Youko is having a party on the Valentines' Day.  The girls refused her invite, but found out that their love are going to her party, even Azuki-chan's brother is going!
characters: ['Ogasawara, Yuunosuke', 'Kodama, Midori', 'Noyama, Azusa', 'Nishino, Kaoru', 'Takayanagi, Ken', 'Noyama, Daizu', 'Sakakibara, Youko']
voices: ['Miyazaki, Issei', 'Matsumoto, Rica', 'Yukana', 'Kawata, Taeko', 'Madono, Mitsuaki', 'Kozakura, Etsuko', 'Sakuma, Rei']
staff: [['Kojima, Masayuki', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Kawajiri, Yoshiaki', ['Character Design']], ['Akimoto, Yasushi', ['Original Creator']], ['Hara, Hiroshi', ['Key Animation']]]
